subjects.name: Computer Science 101
subjects.description: Introduction to the fundamentals of computer science, including algorithms, data structures, and programming.

subjects.name: Web Development
subjects.description: Exploration of web technologies, covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and popular frameworks.

subjects.name: Database Management
subjects.description: Study of database systems, SQL, and database design principles.

subjects.name: Computer Networks
subjects.description: Understanding of computer network architectures, protocols, and communication systems.

subjects.name: Software Engineering
subjects.description: Principles of software development, including design patterns, testing, and project management.

subjects.name: Artificial Intelligence
subjects.description: Exploration of AI concepts, machine learning, and natural language processing.

subjects.name: Operating Systems
subjects.description: Study of operating system concepts, processes, memory management, and file systems.

subjects.name: Cybersecurity
subjects.description: Focus on securing computer systems, networks, and data from cyber threats.

subjects.name: Mobile App Development
subjects.description: Development of mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.

subjects.name: Data Science
subjects.description: Exploration of techniques for analyzing and interpreting complex data sets.

subjects.name: Computer Graphics
subjects.description: Study of algorithms and techniques for generating visual images and animations.

subjects.name: Human-Computer Interaction
subjects.description: Understanding the design and interaction between humans and computers.

subjects.name: Big Data Analytics
subjects.description: Handling and analyzing large volumes of data using big data technologies.

subjects.name: Cloud Computing
subjects.description: Exploration of cloud computing architectures, services, and deployment.

subjects.name: Computer Ethics
subjects.description: Ethical considerations in the field of computer science and technology.

subjects.name: Computer Vision
subjects.description: Understanding and processing visual information by computers.

subjects.name: Embedded Systems
subjects.description: Study of designing and programming embedded systems for specific tasks.

subjects.name: Network Security
subjects.description: Securing computer networks from unauthorized access and attacks.

subjects.name: Computer Architecture
subjects.description: Understanding the design and structure of computer systems and processors.
